content: lovely little baby hat pattern - great for boys and girls quick to knit and so practical too small preemie medium preemie large preemie newborn *2 further sizes added july 2017 ~ extra-small preemie angel baby* dk 8ply yarn 4mm needles perfect for a little baby shower gift or for charity donation really happy with this design **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
